   30: %% 1222           0 :         } else if (lastput == 0) { /* A multibyte UTF8 character */
   31: %% 1223           0 :             for (i = 0; i < ubytes; ++i) {
   32: %% 1224           0 :                 outc(ubuf[i]);
   33: %% 1225             :             }
   34: %% 1226             :         } else {
   35: %% 1227           0 :             outc(lastput);
   36: %%  - $TERM set to > 1024 long value

   79: -record(tmux, {peer, node, name, ssh_server_name, orig_location }).
   80: suite() ->
   81:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   82:      {timetrap,{minutes,3}}].

   84: all() ->
   85:     [{group, to_erl},
   86:      {group, tty},
   87:      {group, ssh}].

   89: groups() ->
   90:     [{to_erl,[],
   91:       [get_columns_and_rows_escript,get_columns_and_rows,
   92:        exit_initial, job_control_local,
   93:        job_control_remote, job_control_remote_noshell,

   99:        {group, remsh}]},
  100:      {shell_history, [],

  175: 
  176: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  177:     Term = os:getenv("TERM", "dumb"),
  178:     os:putenv("TERM", "vt100"),
  179:     [{term,Term}|Config].
  180: 
  181: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  182:     Term = proplists:get_value(term,Config),
  183:     os:putenv("TERM",Term),
  184:     ok.
  185: 
  186: init_per_group(to_erl, Config) ->
  187:     case rtnode:get_progs() of
  188:         {error, Error} ->
  189:             {skip, Error};
  190:         _ ->
  191:             DefShell = rtnode:get_default_shell(),
  192:             [{default_shell,DefShell}|Config]
  193:     end;
  194: init_per_group(remsh, Config) ->
  195:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  196:         old -> {skip, "Not supported in old shell"};
  197:         new -> Config
  198:     end;
  199: init_per_group(shell_history, Config) ->
  200:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  201:         old -> {skip, "Not supported in old shell"};
  202:         new -> Config
  203:     end;
  204: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group =:= tty; Group =:= ssh ->
  205:     case string:split(tmux("-V")," ") of
  206:         ["tmux",[Num,$.|_]] when Num >= $3, Num =< $9 ->
  207:             tmux("kill-session"),
  208:             "" = tmux("-u new-session -x 50 -y 60 -d"),
  209:             ["" = tmux(["set-environment '",Name,"' '",Value,"'"])
  210:              || {Name,Value} <- os:env()],
  211:             Config;
  212:         ["tmux", Vsn] ->
  213:             {skip, "invalid tmux version " ++ Vsn ++ ". Need vsn 3 or later"};
  214:         Error ->
  215:             {skip, "tmux not installed " ++ Error}
  216:     end;
  217: 
  218: init_per_group(Group, Config) when Group =:= tty_unicode;
  219:                                    Group =:= tty_latin1;
  220:                                    Group =:= ssh_unicode;
  221:                                    Group =:= ssh_latin1 ->
  222:     [Lang,_] =
  223:         string:split(
  224:           os:getenv("LC_ALL",
  225:                     os:getenv("LC_CTYPE",
  226:                               os:getenv("LANG","en_US.UTF-8"))),"."),
  227:     case Group of
  228:         tty_unicode ->
  229:             [{encoding, unicode},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".UTF-8"}]}|Config];
  230:         tty_latin1 ->
  231:             % [{encoding, latin1},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".ISO-8859-1"}]}|Config],
  232:             {skip, "latin1 tests not implemented yet"};
  233:         ssh_unicode ->
  234:             [{encoding, unicode},{env,[{"LC_ALL",Lang++".UTF-8"}]}|Config];
  235:         ssh_latin1 ->
  236:             {skip, "latin1 tests not implemented yet"}
  237:     end;
  238: init_per_group(sh_custom, Config) ->
  239:     %% Ensure that ERL_AFLAGS will not override the value of the shell_history variable.
  240:     {ok, Peer, Node} = ?CT_PEER(["-noshell","-kernel","shell_history","not_overridden"]),
  241:     try erpc:call(Node, application, get_env, [kernel, shell_history], rtnode:timeout(normal)) of
  242:         {ok, not_overridden} ->
  243:             Config;
  244:         _ ->
  245:             SkipText = "shell_history variable is overridden (probably by ERL_AFLAGS)",
  246:             {skip, SkipText}
  247:     catch
  248:         C:R:Stk ->
  249:             io:format("~p\n~p\n~p\n", [C,R,Stk]),
  250:             {skip, "Unexpected error"}
  251:     after
  252:         peer:stop(Peer)
  253:     end;
  254: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  255:     Config.
  256: 
  257: end_per_group(Group, _Config) when Group =:= tty; Group =:= ssh ->
  258:     Windows = string:split(tmux("list-windows"), "\n", all),
  259:     lists:foreach(
  260:       fun(W) ->
  261:               case string:split(W, " ", all) of
  262:                   ["0:" | _] -> ok;
  263:                   [No, _Name | _] ->
  264:                       "" = os:cmd(["tmux select-window -t ", string:split(No,":")]),
  265:                       ct:log("~ts~n~ts",[W, os:cmd(lists:concat(["tmux capture-pane -p -e"]))])
  266:               end
  267:       end, Windows),
  268: %    "" = os:cmd("tmux kill-session")
  269:     ok;
  270: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  271:     Config.
  272: 
  273: init_per_testcase(Func, Config) ->
  274:     Path = [Func,
  275:             [proplists:get_value(name,P) ||
  276:                 P <- [proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties,Config,[])] ++
  277:                     proplists:get_value(tc_group_path,Config,[])]],
  278:     [{tc_path, lists:concat(lists:join("-",lists:flatten(Path)))} | Config].
  279: 
  280: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  281:     GroupProperties = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  282:     case (GroupProperties =/= false) andalso proplists:get_value(parallel, GroupProperties, false) of
  283:         true -> ok;
  284:         false ->
  285:             %% Terminate any connected nodes. They may disturb test cases that follow.
  286:             lists:foreach(fun(Node) ->
  287:                                   catch erpc:call(Node, erlang, halt, [])
  288:                           end, nodes()),
  289:             ok
  290:     end.
  291: 
  292: %%-define(DEBUG,1).
  293: -ifdef(DEBUG).
  294: -define(dbg(Data),ct:pal("~p",[Data])).
  295: -else.
  296: -define(dbg(Data),noop).
  297: -endif.
  298: 
  299: string_to_term(Str) ->
  300:     {ok,Tokens,_EndLine} = erl_scan:string(Str ++ "."),
  301:     {ok,AbsForm} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
  302:     {value,Value,_Bs} = erl_eval:exprs(AbsForm, erl_eval:new_bindings()),
  303:     Value.
  304: 
  305: run_unbuffer_escript(Rows, Columns, EScript, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut) ->
  306:     DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "interactive_shell_SUITE_data"),
  307:     TmpFile = filename:join(DataDir, "tmp"),
  308:     ok = file:write_file(TmpFile, <<>>),
  309:     CommandModifier =
  310:         case {NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut} of
  311:             {false, false} -> "";
  312:             {true, false} -> io_lib:format(" < ~s", [TmpFile]);
  313:             {false, true} -> io_lib:format(" > ~s ; cat ~s", [TmpFile, TmpFile]);
  314:             {true, true} -> io_lib:format(" > ~s < ~s ; cat ~s", [TmpFile, TmpFile, TmpFile])
  315:         end,
  316:     Command = io_lib:format("unbuffer -p bash -c \"stty rows ~p; stty columns ~p; escript ~s ~s\"",
  317:                             [Rows, Columns, EScript, CommandModifier]),
  318:     %% io:format("Command: ~s ~n", [Command]),
  319:     Out = os:cmd(Command),
  320:     %% io:format("Out: ~p ~n", [Out]),
  321:     string_to_term(Out).
  322: 
  323: get_columns_and_rows_escript(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  324:     ExpectUnbufferInstalled =
  325:         try
  326:             "79" = string:trim(os:cmd("unbuffer -p bash -c \"stty columns 79 ; tput cols\"")),
  327:             true
  328:         catch
  329:             _:_ -> false
  330:         end,
  331:     case ExpectUnbufferInstalled of
  332:         false ->
  333:             {skip,
  334:              "The unbuffer tool (https://core.tcl-lang.org/expect/index) does not seem to be installed.~n"
  335:              "On Ubuntu/Debian: \"sudo apt-get install expect\""};
  336:         true ->
  337:             DataDir = filename:join(filename:dirname(code:which(?MODULE)), "interactive_shell_SUITE_data"),
  338:             IoColumnsErl = filename:join(DataDir, "io_columns.erl"),
  339:             IoRowsErl = filename:join(DataDir, "io_rows.erl"),
  340:             [
  341:              begin
  342:                  {ok, 42} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoColumnsErl, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut),
  343:                  {ok, 99} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoRowsErl, NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut)
  344:              end
  345:              ||
  346:                 {NoTermStdIn, NoTermStdOut} <- [{false, false}, {true, false}, {false, true}]
  347:             ],
  348:             {error,enotsup} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoRowsErl, true, true),
  349:             {error,enotsup} = run_unbuffer_escript(99, 42, IoColumnsErl, true, true),
  350:             ok
  351:     end.
  352: 
  353: %% Test that the shell can access columns and rows.
  354: get_columns_and_rows(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  355:     case proplists:get_value(default_shell, Config) of
  356: 	old ->
  357:             test_columns_and_rows(old, []);
  358: 	new ->
  359:             test_columns_and_rows(old, ["-oldshell"]),
  360:             test_columns_and_rows(new, [])
  361:     end,
  362:     ok.
  363: 
  364: test_columns_and_rows(old, Args) ->
  365:     rtnode:run(
  366:       [{putline, ""},
  367:        {putline, "2."},
  368:        {expect, "2\r\n"},
  369:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  370:        {expect, "{error,enotsup}\r\n"},
  371:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  372:        {expect, "{error,enotsup}\r\n"}
  373:       ], [], [], Args),
  374: 
  375:     rtnode:run(
  376:       [{putline, ""},
  377:        {putline, "2."},
  378:        {expect, "2\r\n"},
  379:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  380:        {expect, "{ok,90}\r\n"},
  381:        {putline,"io:rows()."},
  382:        {expect, "{ok,40}\r\n"}],
  383:       [],
  384:       "stty rows 40; stty columns 90; ",
  385:       Args);
  386: test_columns_and_rows(new, _Args) ->
  387:     rtnode:run(
  388:       [{putline, ""},
  389:        {expect, "1> $"},
  390:        {putline, "2."},
  391:        {expect, "\r\n2\r\n"},
  392:        {expect, "> $"},
  393:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  394:        {expect, "{ok,80}\r\n"},
  395:        {expect, "> $"},
  396:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  397:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,24}\r\n"}
  398:       ]),
  399: 
  400:     rtnode:run(
  401:       [{putline, ""},
  402:        {expect, "1> $"},
  403:        {putline, "2."},
  404:        {expect,  "\r\n2\r\n"},
  405:        {expect, "> $"},
  406:        {putline, "io:columns()."},
  407:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,90}\r\n"},
  408:        {expect, "> $"},
  409:        {putline, "io:rows()."},
  410:        {expect, "\r\n{ok,40}\r\n"}],
  411:       [],
  412:       "stty rows 40; stty columns 90; ").
  413: 
  414: shell_navigation(Config) ->
  415: 
  416:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  417: 
  418:     try
  419:         [begin
  420:              send_tty(Term,"{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}"),
  421:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}), %% Check that cursor jump backward
  422:              check_content(Term, "{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}$"),
  423:              timer:sleep(1000), %% Wait for cursor to jump back
  424:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  425:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  426:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  427:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  428:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  429:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  430:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc")}),
  431:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  432:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',")}),
  433:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  434:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,")}),
  435:              send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  436:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b'")}),
  437:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  438:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,")}),
  439:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  440:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{")}),
  441:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  442:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  443:              send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  444:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc}")}),
  445:              send_tty(Term,"C-H"),
  446:              check_location(Term, {0, width("{aaa,'b"++U++"b',ccc")}),
  447:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  448:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  449:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  450:          end || U <- hard_unicode()],
  451:         ok
  452:     after
  453:         stop_tty(Term)
  454:     end.
  455: shell_multiline_navigation(Config) ->
  456:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  457: 
  458:     try
  459:         [begin
  460:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  461:              send_tty(Term,"{aaa,"),
  462:              check_location(Term, {0,width("{aaa,")}),
  463:              send_tty(Term,"\n'b"++U++"b',"),
  464:              check_location(Term, {0, width("'b"++U++"b',")}),
  465:              send_tty(Term,"\nccc}"),
  466:              check_location(Term, {-2, 0}), %% Check that cursor jump backward (blink)
  467:              timer:sleep(1000), %% Wait for cursor to jump back
  468:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  469:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  470:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  471:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  472:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  473:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  474:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc")}),
  475:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  476:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  477:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  478:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U++"b',")}),
  479:              send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  480:              check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  481:              %send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
  482:              %check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  483:              %send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  484:              %check_location(Term, {-1, 1}),
  485:              send_tty(Term,"C-Right"),
  486:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U++"b'")}),
  487:              send_tty(Term,"C-Up"),
  488:              check_location(Term, {-2, width("{aaa,")}),
  489:              send_tty(Term,"C-Down"),
  490:              send_tty(Term,"C-Down"),
  491:              check_location(Term, {0, width("ccc}")}),
  492:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  493:              send_tty(Term,"C-Up"),
  494:              check_location(Term, {-1, width("'b"++U)}),
  495:              send_tty(Term,"M-<"),
  496:              check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
  497:              send_tty(Term,"M->"),
  498:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  499:              check_location(Term, {0,width("ccc")}),
  500:              send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  501:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  502:              check_location(Term, {0,0}),
  503:              send_tty(Term,"C-h"), % Backspace
  504:              check_location(Term, {-1,width("ccc}")}),
  505:              send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
  506:              send_tty(Term, "End"),
  507:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  508:              send_tty(Term,"M-Enter"),
  509:              check_content(Term, ".. ,"),
  510:              check_location(Term, {-1,0}),
  511:              send_tty(Term,"M-c"),
  512:              check_location(Term, {-3,0}),
  513:              send_tty(Term,"{'"++U++"',\n\n\nworks}.\n")
  514:             end || U <- hard_unicode()],
  515:         ok
  516:     after
  517:         stop_tty(Term)
  518:     end.
  519: 
  520: shell_format(Config) ->
  521:     Term1 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","format_shell_func","{shell,erl_pp_format_func}"]}|Config]),
  522:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  523:     EmacsFormat = "\""++DataDir ++ "emacs-format-file\"\n",
  524:     try
  525:         send_tty(Term1,"fun(X) ->\n  X\nend.\n"),
  526:         send_tty(Term1,"Up"),
  527:         %% Note, erl_pp puts 7 spaces before X
  528:         check_content(Term1, "fun\\(X\\) ->\\s*..        X\\s*.. end."),
  529:         send_tty(Term1, "Down"),
  530:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term1)," -x ",200]),
  531:         timer:sleep(1000),
  532:         send_stdin(Term1, "shell:format_shell_func(\"emacs -batch \${file} -l \"\n"),
  533:         send_stdin(Term1, EmacsFormat),
  534:         send_stdin(Term1, "\" -f emacs-format-function\").\n"),
  535:         check_content(Term1, "{shell,erl_pp_format_func}"),
  536:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  537:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  538:         send_tty(Term1, "\n"),
  539:         timer:sleep(1000),
  540:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  541:         %% Note, emacs-format puts 8 spaces before X
  542:         check_content(Term1, "fun\\(X\\) ->\\s*..         X\\s*.. end."),
  543:         send_tty(Term1, "Down"),
  544:         check_content(Term1, ">$"),
  545:         send_stdin(Term1, "shell:format_shell_func({bad,format}).\n"),
  546:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  547:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  548:         send_tty(Term1, "\n"),
  549:         timer:sleep(1000),
  550:         check_content(Term1, "\\Q* Bad format function: {bad,format}\\E"),
  551:         send_tty(Term1, "Up"),
  552:         %% No modifications should be made, when default format function is used
  553:         check_content(Term1, "fun\\(X\\) ->\\s*..         X\\s*.. end."),
  554:         ok
  555:     after
  556:         stop_tty(Term1)
  557:     end.
  558: shell_multiline_prompt_ssh(Config) ->
  559:     Term1 = start_tty(Config),
  560:     try
  561:         send_tty(Term1, "shell:multiline_prompt_func({shell,inverted_space_prompt}).\n"),
  562:         check_location(Term1, {0, 0}),
  563:         send_tty(Term1,"\na"),
  564:         check_location(Term1, {0, 1}),
  565:         check_content(Term1, "   a"),
  566:         ok
  567:     after
  568:         stop_tty(Term1)
  569:     end.
  570: shell_multiline_prompt(Config) ->
  571:     Term1 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","{shell,inverted_space_prompt}"]}|Config]),
  572:     Term2 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","\"...> \""]}|Config]),
  573:     Term3 = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_multiline_prompt","edlin"]}|Config]),
  574:     Term4 = start_tty(Config),
  575: 
  576:     try
  577:         check_location(Term1, {0, 0}),
  578:         send_tty(Term1,"\na"),
  579:         check_location(Term1, {0, 1}),
  580:         check_content(Term1, "   a"),
  581:         ok
  582:     after
  583:         stop_tty(Term1)
  584:     end,
  585:     try
  586:         check_location(Term2, {0, 0}),
  587:         send_tty(Term2,"\na"),
  588:         check_location(Term2, {0, 1}),
  589:         check_content(Term2, "...> a"),
  590:         ok
  591:     after
  592:         stop_tty(Term2)
  593:     end,
  594:     try
  595:         send_tty(Term3,"\na"),
  596:         check_location(Term3, {0, 1}),
  597:         check_content(Term3, ".. a"),
  598:         ok
  599:     after
  600:         stop_tty(Term3)
  601:     end,
  602:     try
  603:         send_tty(Term4, "shell:multiline_prompt_func(\"-> \").\n"),
  604:         check_content(Term4, "default"),
  605:         send_tty(Term4, "a\nb"),
  606:         check_content(Term4, "-> b"),
  607:         ok
  608:     after
  609:         stop_tty(Term4)
  610:     end.
  611: 
  612: shell_clear(Config) ->
  613: 
  614:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  615:     {Rows, _Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  616: 
  617:     try
  618:         send_tty(Term,"foobar."),
  619:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  620:         check_content(Term, "foobar"),
  621:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  622:         send_tty(Term,"bazbat"),
  623:         check_location(Term, {0, 6}),
  624:         send_tty(Term,"C-L"),
  625:         check_location(Term, {-Rows+1, 6}),
  626:         check_content(Term, "bazbat")
  627:     after
  628:         stop_tty(Term)
  629:     end.
  630: 
  631: shell_xnfix(Config) ->
  632: 
  633:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  634: 
  635:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  636:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  637: 
  638:     As = lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1,"a"),
  639: 
  640:     try
  641:         [begin
  642:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  643:              send_tty(Term,As),
  644:              check_content(Term,[As,$$]),
  645:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - 1}),
  646:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  647:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  648:              send_tty(Term,"aaa"),
  649:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col + 3}),
  650:              [send_tty(Term,"Left") || _ <- lists:seq(1,3 + width(U))],
  651:              send_tty(Term,U),
  652:              %% a{Cols-1}U\naaaaa
  653:              check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  654:                                  U,"\n",lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  655:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  656:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  657:              send_tty(Term,U),
  658:              %% a{Cols-1}U\nUaaaaa
  659:              check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  660:                                  U,"\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  661:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  662:              %% send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  663:              %% send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  664:              %% a{Cols-2}U\nUaaaaa
  665:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 2 - width(U),$a),
  666:              %%                     U,"\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  667:              %% send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  668:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 1 - width(U),$a),
  669:              %%                     U,U,"\n",lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  670:              %% send_tty(Term,"aa"),
  671:              %% check_content(Term,[lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - 2 - width(U),$a),
  672:              %%                     U,"a\n",U,lists:duplicate(3+width(U), $a),"$"]),
  673:              %% check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  674:              send_tty(Term,"C-K"),
  675:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  676:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  677:              check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  678:              send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  679:              check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
  680:              send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  681:              ok
  682:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  683:     after
  684:         stop_tty(Term)
  685:     end.
  686: 
  687: 
  688: %% Characters that are larger than 2 wide need special handling when they
  689: %% are at the end of the current line.
  690: shell_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  691: 
  692:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  693: 
  694:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  695:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  696: 
  697:     try
  698:         [begin
  699:              FirstLine = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(U)*2 + 1,"a")],
  700:              OtherLineA = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"a")],
  701:              OtherLineB = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"b")],
  702:              OtherLineC = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"c")],
  703:              OtherLineD = [U,lists:duplicate(Cols - width(U) * 2+1,"d")],
  704:              send_tty(Term,FirstLine),
  705:              check_content(Term, [FirstLine,$$]),
  706:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  707: 
  708:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineA),
  709:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineA,$$]),
  710:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  711: 
  712:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineB),
  713:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineB,$$]),
  714:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  715: 
  716:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineC),
  717:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineC,$$]),
  718:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  719: 
  720:              send_tty(Term,OtherLineD),
  721:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineD,$$]),
  722:              check_location(Term, {0, Cols - Col - width(U)+1}),
  723: 
  724:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  725:              check_location(Term, {-4, 0}), %% Broken
  726:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  727:              check_location(Term, {-4, width(U)}), %% Broken
  728: 
  729:              send_tty(Term,"DC"), %% Broken
  730:              check_content(Term, ["a.*",U,"$"]),
  731:              check_content(Term, ["^b.*",U,"c$"]),
  732:              check_content(Term, ["^c.*",U,"dd$"]),
  733: 
  734:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  735:              check_content(Term, [FirstLine,$$]),
  736:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineA,$$]),
  737:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineB,$$]),
  738:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineC,$$]),
  739:              check_content(Term, [OtherLineD,$$]),
  740: 
  741:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  742:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  743:     after
  744:         stop_tty(Term)
  745:     end.
  746: 
  747: shell_delete(Config) ->
  748: 
  749:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  750: 
  751:     try
  752: 
  753:         [ begin
  754:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  755:               check_content(Term, "> a$"),
  756:               check_location(Term, {0, 1}),
  757:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  758:               check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  759:               check_content(Term, ">$"),
  760:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  761:               send_tty(Term,U),
  762:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a, U])}),
  763:               send_tty(Term,"a"),
  764:               send_tty(Term,U),
  765:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a,U,$a,U])}),
  766:               check_content(Term, ["> a",U,$a,U,"$"]),
  767:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  768:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  769:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  770:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  771:               check_content(Term, ["> aa",U,"$"]),
  772:               send_tty(Term,U),
  773:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a,U])}),
  774:               send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  775:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  776:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  777:               check_content(Term, ["> aa",U,"$"]),
  778:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  779:               send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  780:               check_content(Term, ["> a$"]),
  781:               send_tty(Term,"C-E"),
  782:               check_location(Term, {0, width([$a])}),
  783:               send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  784:               check_location(Term, {0, width([])})
  785:           end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  786:     after
  787:         stop_tty(Term)
  788:     end.
  789: 
  790: %% When deleting characters at the edge of the screen that are "large",
  791: %% we need to take special care.
  792: shell_delete_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  793: 
  794:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  795: 
  796:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  797:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  798: 
  799:     try
  800:         [begin
  801:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col,"a")),
  802:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  803:              send_tty(Term,[U,U,"aaaaa"]),
  804:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,U,"aaaaa$"]),
  805:              [send_tty(Term,"Left") || _ <- lists:seq(1,5+2)],
  806:              check_location(Term,{0,-Col}),
  807:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  808:              check_content(Term,"> a* \n"),
  809:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 1}),
  810:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  811:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\n"]),
  812:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 2}),
  813:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  814:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U," \n"]),
  815:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 3}),
  816:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  817:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,U,"\n"]),
  818:              check_content(Term,["\naaaaa$"]),
  819:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 4}),
  820:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  821:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,U,"a\n"]),
  822:              check_content(Term,["\naaaa$"]),
  823:              check_location(Term,{-1,Cols - Col - 5}),
  824:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  825:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  826:     after
  827:         stop_tty(Term)
  828:     end.
  829: 
  830: %% When deleting characters and a "large" characters is changing line we need
  831: %% to take extra care
  832: shell_delete_unicode_not_at_cursor_wrap(Config) ->
  833: 
  834:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  835: 
  836:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  837:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  838: 
  839:     try
  840:         [begin
  841:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col,"a")),
  842:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  843:              send_tty(Term,["a",U,"aaaaa"]),
  844:              check_content(Term,["\na",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  845:              send_tty(Term,"C-A"),
  846:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  847:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  848:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  849:              check_content(Term,["\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  850:              check_content(Term,["> a* \n"]),
  851:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  852:              check_content(Term,["\naaaaa$"]),
  853:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\n"]),
  854:              send_tty(Term,"DC"),
  855:              check_content(Term,["\naaaa$"]),
  856:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"a\n"]),
  857:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  858:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  859:     after
  860:         stop_tty(Term)
  861:     end.
  862: 
  863: %% When deleting characters and a "large" characters is changing line we need
  864: %% to take extra care
  865: shell_update_window_unicode_wrap(Config) ->
  866: 
  867:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  868: 
  869:     {_Rows, Cols} = get_window_size(Term),
  870:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  871: 
  872:     try
  873:         [begin
  874:              send_tty(Term,lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(U) + 1,"a")),
  875:              check_content(Term,"> a*$"),
  876:              send_tty(Term,[U,"aaaaa"]),
  877:              check_content(Term,["> a* ?\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  878:              tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",Cols+1]),
  879:              check_content(Term,["> a*",U,"\naaaaa$"]),
  880:              tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",Cols]),
  881:              check_content(Term,["> a* ?\n",U,"aaaaa$"]),
  882:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  883:          end || U <- hard_unicode()]
  884:     after
  885:         stop_tty(Term)
  886:     end.
  887: 
  888: shell_transpose(Config) ->
  889: 
  890:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  891: 
  892:     Unicode = [[$a]] ++ hard_unicode(),
  893: 
  894:     try
  895:         [
  896:          begin
  897:              send_tty(Term,"a"),
  898:              [send_tty(Term,[CP]) || CP <- U],
  899:              send_tty(Term,"b"),
  900:              [[send_tty(Term,[CP]) || CP <- U2] || U2 <- Unicode],
  901:              send_tty(Term,"cde"),
  902:              check_content(Term, ["a",U,"b",Unicode,"cde$"]),
  903:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["a",U,"b",Unicode,"cde"])}),
  904:              send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  905:              check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  906:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  907:              send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  908:              check_location(Term, {0, 1+width([U])}),
  909:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  910:              check_content(Term, ["ab",U,Unicode,"cde$"]),
  911:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  912:              check_content(Term, ["ab",hd(Unicode),U,tl(Unicode),"cde$"]),
  913:              [send_tty(Term,"C-T") || _ <- lists:seq(1,length(Unicode)-1)],
  914:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,U,"cde$"]),
  915:              send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  916:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,"c",U,"de$"]),
  917:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["ab",Unicode,"c",U])}),
  918:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  919:              check_location(Term, {0, width(["ab",Unicode,"c",U,"de"])}),
  920:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  921:              send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  922:              send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  923:              check_content(Term, ["ab",Unicode,"cde$"]),
  924:              send_tty(Term,"End"),
  925:              send_tty(Term,"Enter")
  926:          end || U <- Unicode],
  927:         ok
  928:     after
  929:         stop_tty(Term),
  930:         ok
  931:     end.
  932: 
  933: shell_search(C) ->
  934:     Term = start_tty(C),
  935: 
  936:     try
  937:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  938:         send_tty(Term,"."),
  939:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  940:         send_tty(Term,"'"),
  941:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  942:         send_tty(Term,[16#1f600]),
  943:         send_tty(Term,"'"),
  944:         send_tty(Term,"."),
  945:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  946:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}),
  947:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  948:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a😀'."),
  949:         send_tty(Term,"C-a"),
  950:         check_location(Term, {-1, width(C, "'a😀'.")}),
  951:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
  952:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  953:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a😀'."),
  954:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
  955:         check_content(Term, "search: a\\s*\n\\s*'a😀'."),
  956:         send_tty(Term,"C-r"),
  957:         check_content(Term, "search: a\\s*\n\\s*a."),
  958:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  959:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a😀'."),
  960:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  961:         check_content(Term, "search:\\s*\n\\s*'a😀'."),
  962:         send_tty(Term,"M-c"),
  963:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
  964:         ok
  965:     after
  966:         stop_tty(Term),
  967:         ok
  968:     end.
  969: 
  970: shell_insert(Config) ->
  971:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  972: 
  973:     try
  974:         send_tty(Term,"abcdefghijklm"),
  975:         check_content(Term, "abcdefghijklm$"),
  976:         check_location(Term, {0, 13}),
  977:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
  978:         send_tty(Term,"Right"),
  979:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  980:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  981:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  982:         send_tty(Term,"C-T"),
  983:         check_content(Term, "bcdeafghijklm$"),
  984:         send_tty(Term,"End"),
  985:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  986:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
  987:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
  988:         check_content(Term, "bcdeafghijlm$"),
  989:         ok
  990:     after
  991:         stop_tty(Term)
  992:     end.
  993: 
  994: shell_update_window(Config) ->
  995:     Term = start_tty(Config),
  996: 
  997:     Text = lists:flatten(["abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm"]),
  998:     {_Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
  999: 
 1000:     try
 1001:         send_tty(Term,Text),
 1002:         check_content(Term,Text),
 1003:         check_location(Term, {0, width(Text)}),
 1004:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text)+Col+1]),
 1005:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
 1006:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col}),
 1007:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1008:         check_location(Term, {-1, width(Text)}),
 1009:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text)+Col]),
 1010:         %% When resizing, tmux does not xnfix the cursor, so it will remain
 1011:         %% at the previous locations
 1012:         check_location(Term, {-1, width(Text)}),
 1013:         send_tty(Term,"a"),
 1014:         check_location(Term, {0, -Col + 1}),
 1015: 
 1016:         %% When we do backspace here, tmux seems to place the cursor in an
 1017:         %% incorrect position except when a terminal is attached.
 1018:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1019:         %% This really should be {0, -Col}, but sometimes tmux sets it to
 1020:         %% {-1, width(Text)} instead.
 1021:         check_location(Term, [{0, -Col}, {-1, width(Text)}]),
 1022: 
 1023:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x ",width(Text) div 2 + Col]),
 1024:         %% Depending on what happened with the cursor above, the line will be
 1025:         %% different here.
 1026:         check_location(Term, [{0, -Col + width(Text) div 2},
 1027:                               {-1, -Col + width(Text) div 2}]),
 1028:         ok
 1029:     after
 1030:         stop_tty(Term)
 1031:     end.
 1032: shell_small_window_multiline_navigation(Config) ->
 1033:     Term0 = start_tty(Config),
 1034:     tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term0)," -x ",30, " -y ", 6]),
 1035:     {Row, Col} = get_location(Term0),
 1036:     Term = Term0#tmux{orig_location = {Row, Col}},
 1037:     Text = ("xbcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm\n"++
 1038:         "abcdefghijkl\n"++
 1039:         "abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklm\n"++
 1040:         "abcdefghijklmabcdefghijklx"),
 1041:     try
 1042:         send_tty(Term,Text),
 1043:         check_location(Term, {0, -4}),
 1044:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
 1045:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
 1046:         send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
 1047:         check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
 1048:         send_tty(Term, "C-Down"),
 1049:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
 1050:         send_tty(Term, "Left"),
 1051:         check_location(Term, {-1, -4}),
 1052:         send_tty(Term, "Right"),
 1053:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
 1054:         send_tty(Term, "\e[1;4A"),
 1055:         check_location(Term, {-5, 0}),
 1056:         check_content(Term,"xbc"),
 1057:         send_tty(Term, "\e[1;4B"),
 1058:         check_location(Term, {0, -4}),
 1059:         check_content(Term,"klx"),
 1060:         send_tty(Term, " sets:is_e\t"),
 1061:         check_content(Term,"is_element"),
 1062:         check_content(Term,"is_empty"),
 1063:         check_location(Term, {-3, 6}),
 1064:         send_tty(Term, "C-Up"),
 1065:         send_tty(Term,"Home"),
 1066:         check_location(Term, {-2, 0}),
 1067:         send_tty(Term, "sets:is_e\t"),
 1068:         check_content(Term,"is_element"),
 1069:         check_content(Term,"is_empty"),
 1070:         check_location(Term, {-4, 9}),
 1071:         send_tty(Term, "M-Enter"),
 1072:         check_location(Term, {-1, 0}),
 1073:         ok
 1074:     after
 1075:         stop_tty(Term)
 1076:     end.
 1077: shell_huge_input(Config) ->
 1078:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1079: 
 1080:     ManyUnicode = lists:duplicate(100,hard_unicode()),
 1081: 
 1082:     try
 1083:         send_tty(Term,ManyUnicode),
 1084:         check_content(Term, hard_unicode_match(Config) ++ "$",
 1085:                       #{ replace => {"\n",""} }),
 1086:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1087:         ok
 1088:     after
 1089:         stop_tty(Term)
 1090:     end.
 1091: output_to_stdout_slowly(5) -> ok;
 1092: output_to_stdout_slowly(N) ->
 1093:     receive
 1094:         after 100 ->
 1095:             io:format("~p~n", [N]),
 1096:             output_to_stdout_slowly(N+1)
 1097:     end.
 1098: 
 1099: shell_receive_standard_out(Config) ->
 1100:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1101:     try
 1102:         send_tty(Term, "spawn(interactive_shell_SUITE, output_to_stdout_slowly, [0]). ABC\n"),
 1103:         timer:sleep(1000),
 1104:         check_location(Term, {0, 0}), %% Check that we are at the same location relative to the start.
 1105:         check_content(Term, "3\\s+4\\s+.+>\\sABC"),
 1106:         ok
 1107:     after
 1108:         stop_tty(Term)
 1109:     end.
 1110: %% Test that the shell works when invalid utf-8 (aka latin1) is sent to it
 1111: shell_invalid_unicode(Config) ->
 1112:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1113: 
 1114:     InvalidUnicode = <<$å,$ä,$ö>>, %% åäö in latin1
 1115: 
 1116:     try
 1117:         send_tty(Term,hard_unicode()),
 1118:         check_content(Term, hard_unicode() ++ "$"),
 1119:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1120:         check_content(Term, "illegal character"),
 1121:         %% Send invalid utf-8
 1122:         send_stdin(Term,InvalidUnicode),
 1123:         %% Check that the utf-8 was echoed
 1124:         check_content(Term, "\\\\345\\\\344\\\\366$"),
 1125:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1126:         %% Check that the terminal entered "latin1" mode
 1127:         send_tty(Term,"😀한."),
 1128:         check_content(Term, "\\Q\\360\\237\\230\\200\\355\\225\\234.\\E$"),
 1129:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1130:         %% Check that we can reset the encoding to unicode
 1131:         send_tty(Term,"io:setopts([{encoding,unicode}])."),
 1132:         send_tty(Term,"Enter"),
 1133:         check_content(Term, "\nok\n"),
 1134:         send_tty(Term,"😀한"),
 1135:         check_content(Term, "😀한$"),
 1136:         ok
 1137:     after
 1138:         stop_tty(Term),
 1139:         ok
 1140:     end.
 1141: 
 1142: 
 1143: %% Test the we can handle ansi insert, navigation and delete
 1144: %%   We currently can not so skip this test
 1145: shell_support_ansi_input(Config) ->
 1146: 
 1147:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1148: 
 1149:     BoldText = "\e[;1m",
 1150:     ClearText = "\e[0m",
 1151: 
 1152:     try
 1153:         send_tty(Term,["{",BoldText,"a😀b",ClearText,"}"]),
 1154:         timer:sleep(1000),
 1155:         try check_location(Term, {0, width("{1ma😀bm}")}) of
 1156:             _ ->
 1157:                 throw({skip, "Do not support ansi input"})
 1158:         catch _:_ ->
 1159:                 ok
 1160:         end,
 1161:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{a😀b}")}),
 1162:         check_content(fun() -> get_content(Term,"-e") end,
 1163:                       ["{", BoldText, "a😀b", ClearText, "}"]),
 1164:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
 1165:         send_tty(Term,"Left"),
 1166:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{a😀")}),
 1167:         send_tty(Term,"C-Left"),
 1168:         check_location(Term, {0, width("{")}),
 1169:         send_tty(Term,"End"),
 1170:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1171:         send_tty(Term,"BSpace"),
 1172:         check_content(Term, ["{", BoldText, "a😀"]),
 1173:         ok
 1174:     after
 1175:         stop_tty(Term),
 1176:         ok
 1177:     end.
 1178: 
 1179: shell_expand_location_below(Config) ->
 1180: 
 1181:     Term = start_tty(Config),
 1182: 
 1183:     {Rows, _} = get_window_size(Term),
 1184:     {Row, Col} = get_location(Term),
 1185: 
 1186:     NumFunctions = lists:seq(0, Row*2),
 1187:     FunctionName = "a_long_function_name",
 1188: 
 1189:     Module = lists:flatten(
 1190:                ["-module(long_module).\n",
 1191:                 "-export([",lists:join($,,[io_lib:format("~s~p/0",[FunctionName,I]) || I <- NumFunctions]),"]).\n\n",
 1192:                 [io_lib:format("~s~p() -> ok.\n",[FunctionName,I]) || I <- NumFunctions]]),
 1193: 
 1194:     DoScan = fun F([]) ->
 1195:                      [];
 1196:                  F(Str) ->
 1197:                      {done,{ok,T,_},C} = erl_scan:tokens([],Str,0),
 1198:                      [ T | F(C) ]
 1199:              end,
 1200:     Forms = [ begin {ok,Y} = erl_parse:parse_form(X),Y end || X <- DoScan(Module) ],
 1201:     {ok,_,Bin} = compile:forms(Forms, [debug_info]),
 1202: 
 1203:     try
 1204:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1205:         Cols = 80,
 1206: 
 1207:         %% First check that basic completion works
 1208:         send_tty(Term, "escript:"),
 1209:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1210:         %% Cursor at correct place
 1211:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("escript:")}),
 1212:         %% Nothing after the start( completion
 1213:         check_content(Term, "start\\($"),
 1214: 
 1215:         %% Check that completion is cleared when we type
 1216:         send_tty(Term, "s"),
 1217:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("escript:s")}),
 1218:         check_content(Term, "escript:s$"),
 1219: 
 1220:         %% Check that completion works when in the middle of a term
 1221:         send_tty(Term, "Home"),
 1222:         send_tty(Term, "["),
 1223:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1224:         send_tty(Term, ", test_after]"),
 1225:         [send_tty(Term, "Left") || _ <- ", test_after]"],
 1226:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1227:         check_location(Term, {-3, width("[escript:s")}),
 1228:         check_content(Term, "script_name\\([ ]+start\\($"),
 1229:         send_tty(Term, "C-K"),
 1230: 
 1231:         %% Check that completion works when in the middle of a long term
 1232:         send_tty(Term, ", "++ lists:duplicate(80*2, $a)++"]"),
 1233:         [send_tty(Term, "Left") || _ <- ", "++ lists:duplicate(80*2, $a)++"]"],
 1234:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1235:         check_location(Term, {-4, width("[escript:s")}),
 1236:         check_content(Term, "script_name\\([ ]+start\\($"),
 1237:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1238:         send_tty(Term, ".\n"),
 1239: 
 1240:         %% Check that we behave as we should with very long completions
 1241:         rpc(Term, fun() ->
 1242:                           {module, long_module} = code:load_binary(long_module, "long_module.beam", Bin)
 1243:                   end),
 1244:         check_content(Term, "3>"),
 1245:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -y 50"]),
 1246:         timer:sleep(1000), %% Sleep to make sure window has resized
 1247:         Result = 61,
 1248:         Rows1 = 48,
 1249:         send_tty(Term, "long_module:" ++ FunctionName),
 1250:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1251:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name0\\("),
 1252: 
 1253:         %% Check that correct text is printed below expansion
 1254:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1255:                                           [1, 7, Result])),
 1256:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1257:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1258:             [1, Rows1, Result])),
 1259:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1260:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1261:                                           [2, Rows1+1, Result])),
 1262:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1263:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1264:                                           [7, Rows1+6, Result])),
 1265:         send_tty(Term, "PgUp"),
 1266:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1267:                                           [2, Rows1+1, Result])),
 1268:         send_tty(Term, "PgUp"),
 1269:         %% Overshoot up
 1270:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1271:                                           [1, Rows1, Result])),
 1272:         %% Overshoot down
 1273:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1274:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1275:         send_tty(Term, "PgDn"),
 1276:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1277:                                           [14, Rows1+13, Result])),
 1278:         check_content(Term, "\n.*a_long_function_name99\\("),
 1279:         send_tty(Term, "Up"),
 1280:         check_content(Term, io_lib:format("rows ~w to ~w of ~w",
 1281:                                           [13, Rows1+12, Result])),
 1282: 
 1283:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1284: 
 1285:         %% We resize the terminal to make everything fit and test that
 1286:         %% expand below displays everything
 1287:         tmux(["resize-window -t ", tty_name(Term), " -y ", integer_to_list(Row+10)]),
 1288:         timer:sleep(1000), %% Sleep to make sure window has resized
 1289:         send_tty(Term, "\t\t"),
 1290:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name99\\($"),
 1291: 
 1292:         %% Check that doing an expansion when cursor is in xnfix position works
 1293:         send_tty(Term, "BSpace"),
 1294:         check_content(Term, "3> long_module:a_long_function_nam$"),
 1295:         send_tty(Term, "Home"),
 1296:         send_tty(Term, lists:duplicate(Cols - Col - width(", long_module:a_long_function_name"), "a")),
 1297:         send_tty(Term, ", "),
 1298:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1299:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1300:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 2, -Col}),
 1301:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1302:         check_content(Term, "3> a+, long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\n\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name0\\("),
 1303:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 2, -Col}),
 1304:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1305:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 2, -Col}),
 1306:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1307:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 2, -Col}),
 1308: 
 1309:         send_tty(Term, "Home"),
 1310:         send_tty(Term, lists:duplicate(Cols, "b")),
 1311:         send_tty(Term, "End"),
 1312:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1313:         check_content(Term, "3> b+\nb+a+, long_module:" ++ FunctionName ++ "\n\nfunctions(\n|.)*a_long_function_name0\\("),
 1314:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 3, -Col}),
 1315:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1316:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 3, -Col}),
 1317:         send_tty(Term, "Down"),
 1318:         check_location(Term, {-Rows + 3, -Col}),
 1319: 
 1320:         ok
 1321:     after
 1322:         stop_tty(Term),
 1323:         ok
 1324:     end.
 1325: 
 1326: shell_expand_location_above(Config) ->
 1327: 
 1328:     Term = start_tty([{args,["-stdlib","shell_expand_location","above"]}|Config]),
 1329: 
 1330:     try
 1331:         tmux(["resize-window -t ",tty_name(Term)," -x 80"]),
 1332:         send_tty(Term, "escript:"),
 1333:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1334:         check_location(Term, {0, width("escript:")}),
 1335:         check_content(Term, "start\\(\n"),
 1336:         check_content(Term, "escript:$"),
 1337:         send_tty(Term, "s"),
 1338:         send_tty(Term, "\t"),
 1339:         check_location(Term, {0, width("escript:s")}),
 1340:         check_content(Term, "\nscript_name\\([ ]+start\\(\n"),
 1341:         check_content(Term, "escript:s$"),
 1342:         ok
 1343:     after
 1344:         stop_tty(Term),
 1345:         ok
 1346:     end.
